phrases: Yeah, she got angry at me after all.
It was like she was possessed by a demon.
I told her I would run away from home, and she said to go ahead and try it.
I guess I tried to set her off and she called my bluff.
I need this to sleep too.
You must be seriously sleep deprived.
Calm down and think things through.
You cannot run away from home.
And you should not skip school either.
Once you have tried skipping school, it will get out of hand.
Nothing changes if you just skip one day.
But since nothing changed, you tell yourself it is OK to skip one more day, and then another, and the days just keep adding up.
And before you realize, you have already...
Yeah, I guess I do not really have a right to lecture you about that.
You have not lost your style while living as a shut-in.
No matter what you are going through, you only think of others.
All you ever do is worry about others.
I talked to Yukiatsu, and he said that we are all still obsessed with Menma.
And he said that maybe that is not healthy.
Say what you want, but she is at my house right now.
That is what I am talking about...
Wait, you do not believe in Menma?
No, it is not that I do not believe in her.
I bought some beef bowl curry.
It is not what you think!
I was just here for the diary...
By reading this we might figure out Menma's wish.
The Menma I do not know is in here.
The things Menma thought that I do not know about are in here.
The only thing that is different is whether she says she had fun or a blast.
Hey, this one's a little different.
I tripped while playing with everyone today.
Today we all went to the hospital to visit Jintan's mom.
We did do that often, all of us together.
Jintan's mom is always in the hospital.
Let us all write a letter to God.
Please make Jintan's mom better soon!
We decided that we will make fireworks together.
We think that it will be tough.
But we will do our best.
We were going to attach a letter to a rocket and send it to God.
Do you think this is her wish?
We wanted to make one but in the end we could not.
I was not thinking about Jintan at all.
You will turn into a pig if you eat late at night.
You are the one who will turn into a pig.
They were out of Ken-chan ramen.
I thought I would cheer you up by giving you a treat.
My dad's coming home soon, so hurry up.
Oh yeah, I am going to school tomorrow too.
Just make sure not to do weird stuff anymore.
So why are you wearing your uniform even though you are skipping school?
I have the freedom to choose the way I dress and...
According to the Conflagrating Substance Control Law,
You have to be 18 to get a nationally recognized license to possess or handle fireworks.
It looks like little toy fireworks are an exception,
but you need a license for those too.
If you think about it, we are not even remotely qualified to make fireworks...
Come to think of it, while cleaning the other day...
Get a bunch of fireworks and mix the powder together to make one big one!
Stick it into a toilet paper roll.
But back then we thought this could work.
We really thought we could get this flying back then.
It would be way cooler than anything we had seen at festivals.
We thought we could get it to fly.
High-schoolers looked like old people to us back then, but we thought we would be able to do anything once we got there.
Now it feels like we were more free to do anything back then.
We agreed to think about how to proceed,
but really, it is hopeless no matter how you look at it.
Just keep one thing in mind.
If this is not Menma's wish that you keep talking about, it will just be a wild goose chase.
Have you confirmed it with the Menma who is at your house?
Asking her directly is kind of scary.
There is Jintan, always forging ahead.
And poor Yukiatsu, seeing him off.
So why did not you tell everyone?
If he had not told us to meet up at the hideout that day...
Did not Menma call us out that day?
She said she had something to talk about.
You have finally remembered that, so why did not you tell everyone?
Menma told us to keep the meeting a secret from Yadomi.
I know someone who make them.
An old guy from my work says he works as a pyrotechnician during festivals.
Do you want to make fireworks?
So that is how it is.
I will ask him for you then.
I cannot get out of Condal City!
I will get in touch with him.
Let us talk about that later.
Yeah, even the simple ones will cost you around that much.
It is not that I am not willing to let you try to make one though.
Whoa, I have not ever seen that much cash.
Anaru and I can work ourselves to death with part-time jobs, right?
How about you stop deciding things for me?
Is not it a good idea?
We would be helping each other out.
It will be easy if you work seven days a week!
I still have not agreed to do it.
You enter the cash you receive here.
This is the used price, and this one's for new items...
Oh, and so you put the balance in here.
How come you have instantly picked up the technique it took me a month to master...
It took you way too long.
She is that girl people are talking about.
So she showed up to her job.
Hey is that the guy who does not go to school?
You think they are hookin' up?
I want to hit that too...
It is the same way it was back then.
It looks like he is serious about the fireworks.
What are you going to do?
Should we set up some kind of fund-raiser?
Are you going to get caught up in Yadomi's little hobbies?
I will pass if you are not going to participate.
Hey, want to hang out a bit?
We could grab tea or something.
You are not ranked fourth in your year for nothing.
The guy ranked second in his year should not be talking.
Hanging out with you brings its own difficulties you know.
You are so late, Jintan... you delinquent!
I am going to take a bath.
He goes to sleep right away at night.
He leaves right away in the morning.
If the puppy is a girl, it means Jintan is doing something weird.
Today's puppy is Oscar, a girl.
By the way, did Jinta quit school?
But a little while ago I saw him...
I guess he was working a part-time job?
Has he told you about that?
But you could say I am a proponent of free will.
I let Jintan decide on his own.
I am not scheduled today, but apparently the manager took a liking to him.
You are working with him tonight though, right?
Is not that going a little overboard?
Rocket fireworks are fueled by money.
Think about yourself a little more!
By the way, did Yukiatsu get in touch with you?
Yeah you know, we talk every once in a while.
It would be nice if they came by too.
It is obvious they are worried about Jintan.
That is what you call him.
What is wrong with me calling him Jintan?
He is giving it his all.
While I have not been thinking about myself...
Jintan has always been thinking about me.
Do not change the angle of the light on your own!
You think the wind could move that light?
You need to learn some moderation.
It tastes a lot like the ones my mom made.
Yeah, but it is also fun.
Yeah, how can I put it...
I guess it unexpectedly feels better than always staying at home.
I feel alive while I am there.
Oh, no, I did not mean that literally...
I mean, up until now I have been...
I also feel alive when I look at you while you feel alive!
I know it is not nearly enough, but could I get started on it now?
I am sorry, but I cannot help you out.
I accidentally let it slip to the director of the festival...
I got scolded for offering to teach high-schoolers this stuff.
I will talk directly to them!
It is one of the Honmas.
It looks like Jinta and the others are trying their best for you.
We still do not know the name of the flower we saw that day.
kimi to korogasu tsukaisute no jitensha
umi wo miwatasu saka wo kakenobotte
souyatte i am about to wa boku no hou e
mada futari wa sugu soko ni irunoni
kimi to korogasu tsukaisute no jitensha
umi wo miwatasu saka wo kakenobotte
souyatte i am about to wa boku no hou e
mada futari wa sugu soko ni irunoni
Upon pages and pages of entries
We have put down all our emotions
But now I have hit a writer's block
I do not know how to finish this page anymore
Putting a bookmark in my diary
You and I go out to ride the bike we found in the dumpster
Let us go to our secret place
Where we piled up our bricks of memories
Run up the hill, where we can see the horizon
Where we can see the sky so fearfully blue
With cider in my right hand
My other hand helps me search for you
You used to come find me way back when
You used to demand me of so much more
You are both still standing right by my side
Yet why do I pray to see you both again?
There must be something off with me
Upon pages and pages of entries
We have put down all our emotions
But now I have hit a writer's block
I do not know how to finish this page anymore
Putting a bookmark in my diary
You and I go out to ride the bike we found in the dumpster
Let us go to our secret place
Where we piled up our bricks of memories
Run up the hill, where we can see the horizon
Where we can see the sky so fearfully blue
With cider in my right hand
My other hand helps me search for you
You used to come find me way back when
You used to demand me of so much more
You are both still standing right by my side
Yet why do I pray to see you both again?
There must be something off with me
kaerimichi no kousaten de koe wo kaketekureta ne
We met in an unexpected moment
when you called out to me at the crosswalk,
ureshikute tanoshikute bouken mo iro iro shita ne
futari no himitsu no kichi no naka
kimi to natsu no owari shourai no yume ookina kibou wasurenai
jyuunen no ato hachigatsu mata deaeru no wo shinjite
kimi ga saigo made kokoro kara arigatou sakendeita koto shitetayo
We shared so many happy times and thrilling adventures
I will never forget the hopes and dreams we shared during that one summer's end.
I am sure we will meet again in another August, in maybe ten years time.
I could feel your heartfelt thanks all the way until the end.
And I know it must have been painful
to hold back your tears and say goodbye with a smile.
But those are my best memories.
